Package FunctionLayer

Class LogicFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • FunctionLayer.LogicFacade
  • public class LogicFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of LogicFacade is to serve as a bridge between the data mappers and the regular classes in which the mapper methods are used. All of the method information is stored in individual mappers and accessed through the LogicFacade methods.
